[8]:

params=np.vstack((np.random.normal(1,3,1000),np.random.beta(1,3,1000),np.random.uniform(0,6,1000))).T

[9]:

src_f = np.exp(np.array(jnp.exp(emulator['net_apply'](emulator['params'], params))))
